summary: Mamay draws on traditional Ukranian and Tatar folktales for its Romeo and Juliet-like love story and parable about chivalry and the struggle for freedom. Hundreds of years ago, in the wild ... See full summary »
cast: Viktoria Spesivtseva|Andrij Bilous|Nazl Sejtablaeva|Sergey Romanyuk|Oles Sanin|Akhtem Seitablaev|Eldar Akimov|Emil Rasilov
title: Mamay
